Package com.g1.mychess.email.controller

Class EmailController

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.email.controller.EmailController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/email") public class EmailController extends Object
Controller for handling email-related requests. This includes endpoints for verification, blacklist, whitelist, password reset, feedback, and tournament notifications. Each endpoint sends a specific type of email.

  • Method Details

    • sendVerificationEmail

      @PostMapping("/verification") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> sendVerificationEmail(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid EmailRequestDTO emailRequestDTO)
      Sends a verification email to a specified recipient.
      Parameters:
      emailRequestDTO - contains recipient's email, username, and a user token for verification
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message if email is sent, otherwise a failure message

    • sendBlacklistEmail

      @PostMapping("/blacklists") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> sendBlacklistEmail(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid BlacklistEmailDTO blacklistEmailDTO)
      Sends a blacklist notification email to a specified recipient.
      Parameters:
      blacklistEmailDTO - contains recipient's email, username, reason for blacklist, and ban duration
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message if email is sent, otherwise a failure message

      Parameters:

      Sends a contact form feedback email.
      Parameters:
      contactFormDTO - contains the sender's name, email, and message
      Returns:

      ResponseEntity indicating success or failure

    • healthCheck
